remarks.format: ## Remarks 署名定義の詳細については[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、XML Paper Specification (XPS) からダウンロードできますで第 10 章を参照してください[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)します。For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). について、デジタル署名で使用可能な Open Packaging Conventions のデジタル署名フレームワーク MSDN の記事を参照してください[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)します。For information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). について[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]、XML Paper Specification (XPS) からダウンロードできますを参照してください。 [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)します。For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 次の例を作成し、のプロパティを設定する方法を示しています、します。The following example shows how to create and set the properties of an . summary.span: 署名者が署名する署名の目的の同意の文字列値を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.

value.span: 目的の同意を表す (例 : "～に同意します")。

span.span: A that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細については、`Intent`で署名定義の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、10 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]仕様で取得した[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. value.span: A署名者を表す例:"Mary Jones, Marketing dept."

span.span: A that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks このプロパティに対応、`SignerName`の属性、`SignatureDefinition`内の要素、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ。This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package. 名前の違いに注意してください。Notice the difference in the names. 詳細については、`SignerName`属性の第 10 章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]仕様で取得した[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)します。For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 署名を要求されている署名者が指定されたドキュメントの部分に署名する必要がある期限の日時を取得または設定します。

value.span: 署名者がパッケージに署名する必要がある期限を表す () 。

span.span: A () that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
The default value is .

summary.span: パッケージへの署名が行われる法域を取得または設定します。

span.span: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.

value.span: 法域を表す (例 : "State of Utah, United States")。

span.span: A that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks このプロパティに対応、`SigningLocation`で署名定義の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ。This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages. 名前の違いに注意してください。Notice the difference in the names. 元のプロデューサー、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージは、このプロパティを設定できます。The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property. 必要に応じて、署名者は誰もが既に署名されている場合、パッケージの署名時に、プロパティを設定できます。Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed. 詳細については、`SigningLocation`要素を参照してください第 10 章で、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]仕様で取得した[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks リンクする、`Signature`要素をこの、設定する必要があります、`Id`の属性、`Signature`の値に、プロパティ。To link a `Signature` element to this , you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the property. 詳細については`Signature`、要素を参照してください、 [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx)スキーマ。For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema. 詳細については、`SpotID`の属性、`SignatureDefinition`内の要素、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、10 章を参照して、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]仕様で入手可能[XPS: 仕様とライセンスをダウンロードします。](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples このプロパティを設定する方法を次の例に示します。The following example shows how to set this property.
